The 'User Interface' Options Panel

The 'User Interface' Options panel allows you to:

  1. Change the View Style to be either Tabbed Pane, List, or MDI. Play with each one and see which is your favorite.
  2. Change the Document Selection to be at the top, let, bottom, or right. In the Tabbed Pane view style, this places the tabs at the specified location; in the List view style, this is where the list will be placed. This option has no effect on the MDI view style.
  3. Change the appearance of the icons in the toolbar and popup menus.
  4. Change the appearance of the Status Bar.
  5. Toggle whether to highlight the names of modified documents. This option only works in the Tabbed Pane and List view styles.

See also: The Options Dialog
